statement.p: The four sequential sides of a quadrilateral have lengths \displaystyle{a}={3.7}, \displaystyle{b}={4.4}, \displaystyle{c}={6.5}, and \displaystyle{d}={8.4} (all measured in yards). The angle between the two smallest sides is \displaystyle\alpha={116}^\circ.
What is the area of this quadrilateral?
